title: AACORS Spring Pillow Cover 16x16 Inch Floral Butterfly Decorations Seasonal Farmhouse Summer Pillow Case Decor for Sofa Couch AA481-16
description: Experience the Happiness of the holiday season with our spring pillow covers.Crafted from high-quality, burlap-like polyester, these covers combine rustic charm and comfort. Each features a unique festive design, enhancing your holiday home decor. Durable and stylish, these pillow covers seamlessly transform ordinary pillows into easter highlights. Perfect for adorning living room, bedroom, or outdoor furnishings. Care instructions: Machine wash cold separately, gentle cycle only, no bleach, tumble dry low. Ideal as a thoughtful gift for friends or to spruce up your own home. Note: Covers only, inserts not included.
